thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1699
thread.title: Andrea

author: Andrea
title: Andrea
text: Easy multi-city search option. Wish there was the ability to change individual flight dates without "starting over". The seat assignment charge screen was confusing and not clear if there was or was not a charge for the seat assignment unless you hovered on the individual fare in the summary at the bottom of the page. 2 fare summaries with different pricing was slightly confusing as well. The seat assignment function worked great.
